fields.description:
This is not a regression.It exists on 3.0.0.GA as well.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a module using CLI(iOS or android)
2. Go into the created module directory and build it using 'ant' command.

Expected result:
2. It should build the module

Actual result:
2. It gives the error 
"Buildfile: build.xml does not exist!
Build failed".
fields.summary: CLI:Module created through CLI give error while building.

comments.body: That's because this functionality is not done. Marking as dupe of TIMOB-10752.
